ref.mixed-citation: Bagalkot, T. R. et al. Dopamine transporter localization in medial forebrain bundle axons indicates its long-range transport primarily by membrane diffusion with a limited contribution of vesicular traffic on retromer-positive compartments. J. Neurosci. JN-RM-0744-20 (2020), 10.1523/jneurosci.0744-20.2020.
